sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
        <v-card 
            class="mx-auto"
            max-width="500">
            <v-sheet max-width="300" class="mx-auto">
                <v-form validate-on="submit lazy" @submit.prevent="submit">
                    <v-row>
                        <v-text-field
                        v-model="login"
                        label="CPF ou Email"
                        ></v-text-field>
                    </v-row>
                    <v-row>
                        <v-text-field
                        v-model="password"
                        label="Password"
                        ></v-text-field>
                    </v-row>
                    <v-btn
                    :loading="loading"
                    type="submit"
                    block
                    class="mt-2"
                    text="Login"
                    ></v-btn>
                </v-form>
            </v-sheet>
        </v-card>
    </v-container>
</template>

<script>
    import { useUsuarioStore } from '../../store/user.js'
  export default {
    data: vm => ({
      loading: false,
      timeout: null,
      login: '',
      password: '',
    }),

    setup() {
        const usuarioStore = useUsuarioStore()

        return { usuarioStore }
    },

    methods: {
      async submit (event) {
        this.loading = true

        const results = {
                email: this.login,
                password: this.password
        }

        this.loading = false

        let response = await this.usuarioStore.login(results);
        console.log(response.data.access_token);
      },
      async checkApi (userName) {
        return new Promise(resolve => {
          clearTimeout(this.timeout)

          this.timeout = setTimeout(() => {
            if (!userName) return resolve('Please enter a user name.')
            if (userName === 'johnleider') return resolve('User name already taken. Please try another one.')

            return resolve(true)
          }, 1000)
        })
      },
    },
  }
</script>
